Hex

Basic examples

  • Plain text 3 digit: #123
  • Plain text 6 digit: #123123
  • Code 3 digit: #123
  • Code 6 digit: #123123
  • Code 8 digit: #12312312

Padding

  • Open: #123123
  • Close: #123123
  • Both: #123123
  • Both, double: #123123

Casing

  • Lower: #00eaff
  • Upper: #00EAFF
  • Mixed: #00eaFF

Several

Two: #123123 #00eaff
